attributes.action: Keep the mandatory 5 day self isolation for those who test positive for Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: The 5 day isolation currently in place helps to reduce the number of people with Covid-19 infecting others. This is common sense and protects the vulnerable. It also reduces the risk of our NHS from becoming overwhelmed.
attributes.background: Keep the mandatory 5 day self isolation rule for those who have symptoms of Covid-19 and/or test positive for Covid-19.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606834
